game.title: The Lost Village
game.objective: Finding the lost village and talking to its elder.
game.description: The villagers have been gone for weeks, and the local lord is worried. He asks you to find out what happened to them and speak with their elderly leader.
game.reward: 50 gold pieces and a magical amulet

task.objective: Speak to the village blacksmith, Grimgold Ironfist.
task.description: Grimgold might have some information about the villagers' disappearance. You can find him in his forge near the old windmill.

task.objective: Search the nearby forest for any signs of the villagers.
task.description: The forest is dense, but you might be able to find some clues or a trail that leads to the lost village. Be careful, as there are rumors of goblin activity in the area.

task.objective: Talk to the elder of the lost village, Thorgrim Stonebeard.
task.description: You will find Thorgrim at the center of the lost village. He should be able to provide more information about what happened to the villagers and offer some guidance on how to proceed.
